titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 316 North Robert Street, Saint Paul, Minnesota, as the "Warren E. Burger Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 217.

action.text: Senate passed companion measure H.R. 436 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/5/1987--Introduced. Designates the Federal building and United States Courthouse located on North Robert Street, St. Paul, Minnesota, as the Warren E. Burger Federal Building and United States Courthouse.
